programme.title: Learning Curve
programme.desc: What has President Trump learned from his first 100 days in office? As Congress reconvenes, Mark McKinnon and John Heilemann head to Capitol Hill to find out. Mark Halperin is in New York City to get Wall Street’s perspective(c)

programme.title: The Hateful Eight
programme.desc: Eight strangers seek refuge from a blizzard in this Western mystery from writer and director Quentin Tarantino. Features an all-star cast, including Samuel L. Jackson, Kurt Russell and Jennifer Jason Leigh

programme.title: Pet
programme.desc: Psychological thriller about a lonely man who bumps into an old crush and subsequently becomes obsessed with her, leading him to hold her captive underneath the animal shelter where he works. But she is not who she seems to be - and his reason to lock her up may not be as crazy as originally thought

programme.title: Spy Kids: Game Over
programme.desc: Under-age agents Juni and Carmen Cortez journey inside the virtual reality world of a 3-D video game designed to outsmart them, as the awe-inspiring graphics and creatures of gaming come to real life. Relying on lightning-quick reflexes, the Spy Kids must battle through tougher and tougher levels of the game, facing challenges that include racing against road warriors and surfing on boiling lava, in order to save the world from a power hungry villain

programme.title: Jane Wants a Boyfriend
programme.desc: A bright-eyed young woman in her mid-20s living with autism, and enamored of old Hollywood romantic movies, decides she wants a boyfriend and when she meets a charming sous chef, it seems that true romance might be possible

programme.title: Crocodile Dundee In Los Angeles
programme.desc: Mick Dundee (Paul Hogan) is back in this sequel that finds the famed crocodile hunter relocating with his lady love Sue (Linda Kozlowski) and their son to the urban jungle of Los Angeles, where Sue takes over her father's newspaper while Mick and his boy are soon up to their necks in trouble investigating a mystery. Paul Rodriguez costars in this warmly funny follow-up

programme.title: The Insider
programme.desc: A former tobacco executive, fired by his employer, becomes a paid consultant for a story regarding unethical practices within that controversial industry. But what begins as a temporary alliance leads to a lengthy battle for both men to save their reputations, and much, much more. Academy Award® winners Al Pacino and Russell Crowe co-star

programme.title: Deja Vu
programme.desc: After a ferry is bombed in New Orleans, an ATF agent joins a unique investigation using experimental surveillance technology to find the bomber - but finds himself becoming obsessed with one of the victims. Denzel Washington stars

programme.title: JIMI: All Is By My Side
programme.desc: André Benjamin stars as Jimi Hendrix in this revealing biopic from writer-director John Ridley ('12 Years A Slave'). Covering a transformative year in Hendrix's life from 1966-67, in which he went from a New York City backing musician to making his mark in London's music scene up until his Monterey Pop triumph, the film presents an intimate portrait of the sensitive young musician on the verge of becoming a rock legend

programme.title: Love Actually
programme.desc: This classic holiday romantic comedy interweaves the stories of nine contemporary Londoners, from the handsome bachelor Prime Minister who falls for a junior staffer to a schoolboy with a crush, as they wrestle with the funny, poignant and often silly side of love. Stars Laura Linney, Hugh Grant, Emma Thompson, Colin Firth and Alan Rickman

programme.title: Jackson
programme.desc: An intimate documentary look into the lives of three women caught up in the complex issues surrounding access to reproductive healthcare in the Deep South: Shannon Brewer, director of Jackson Women's Health Organization, the only remaining abortion clinic in Mississippi; Barbara Beaver, a leader of the anti-abortion movement, who runs the Center for Pregnancy Choices; and April Jackson, a young mother of four faced with another unplanned pregnancy

programme.title: Golden Frog Time

programme.title: My Nation
programme.desc: The internet was hailed for democratizing ideas. But it is also an arena where conspiracy theories and polarizing echo chambers thrive. In this episode, meet an Alt-Right organizer who's using his social network to urge online sympathizers to join his real world rebellion; the desperate parents of a 17-year-old girl, brainwashed into posting White Nationalist YouTube videos; plus, an American-born former Al-Qaeda recruiter who's had a prolific effect on support for jihad(c)

programme.title: Steve Byrne: Tell The Damn Joke
programme.desc: He's a comic. A husband. A dad. An American. And on top of it all, he's hilarious. Steve Byrne brings his signature style to Chicago with an all-new comedy special that holds no punches, calls it like it is and tells the damn jokes

programme.title: Best in Sex: 2017 AVN Awards
programme.desc: Considered the industry's highest honor, the AVN Awards celebrates outstanding achievements in the world of adult entertainment in categories that recognize performers, directors, retailers, websites and more. Featuring rap sensation Flo Rida, adult superstars Riley Reid and Aspen Rae, with comedian co-host Colin Kane

programme.title: Don Jon
programme.desc: A dissatisfied lothario embarks on a journey to find a more gratifying sex life, but ends up learning larger lessons of life and love through relationships with two very different women

programme.title: Body
programme.desc: After three twenty-something girls break into a mansion and inadvertently murder the groundskeeper, they slowly self-destruct as they decide what to do with the dead body in the living room

programme.title: Inspector Gadget
programme.desc: A security guard's dreams come true when he is selected to be transformed into a cybernetic police officer. Matthew Broderick and Rupert Everett star

programme.title: Ginger & Rosa
programme.desc: Two inseparable teenage girls growing up in 1960s London as the Cuban Missile Crisis looms explore friendship, activism and budding desire and encounter a pivotal event that will redefine their friendship. Stars Elle Fanning, Annette Bening and Oliver Platt

programme.title: The Caretaker
programme.desc: When a young woman moves into a large Victorian home to become the caretaker to her aging, sickly grandmother, she soon finds herself sleepwalking and having strange visions and is forced to confront her family's darkest secrets before the evil presence in the house overtakes her sanity

programme.title: Match
programme.desc: Patrick Stewart stars as a master dance teacher and choreographer with a lifetime of memories, who is interviewed by a young couple and unexpectedly forced to confront the painful decisions he thought he left in the past

programme.title: Domestic Disturbance
programme.desc: John Travolta stars in this thriller as a divorced boat builder who believes his 11-year-old son is lying about witnessing his new step-dad (Vince Vaughn) committing a murder, until a little investigation reveals that the new man in his family's life is not who he claims to be. Teri Polo costars

programme.title: Casino Royale (2006)
programme.desc: The saga of James Bond, agent 007 of Her Majesty's Secret Service, is given a fresh injection of high-octane thrills with this reboot of the spy series starring Daniel Craig as a newly minted, wet-nosed "blunt instrument" assigned his first mission: take down the sinister La Chiffre, an international arms dealer selling dangerous weapons to terrorists. Eva Green and Judi Dench costar in this box office blockbuster that relaunches the Bond franchise

programme.title: The Fifth Estate
programme.desc: Benedict Cumberbatch stars as WikiLeaks founder Julian Assange in this dramatic thriller based on real events. In a quest to expose the deceptions and corruptions of power, an Internet startup becomes the 21st century's most fiercely debated organization

programme.title: Spy Game
programme.desc: Academy Award®-winner Robert Redford stars as a CIA maverick who is on the brink of retirement from the field when he learns that his protégé (Brad Pitt) has been arrested in China on a charge of espionage and he must find a way to free him

programme.title: Disaster Movie
programme.desc: Demented spoof of end-of-the-world epics, where plucky survivors attempt to save the planet from meteors and rabid squirrels. Matt Lanter, Vanessa Minnillo and Kim Kardashian star in this cheeky satire(n)

programme.title: Fifty Shades of Black
programme.desc: Marlon Wayans stars as Christian Black in a comedy about a millionaire control freak who introduces shy college student Hannah Steele (Kali Hawk) to the world of "romance" after she interviews him for the school newspaper(n)

programme.title: Casino Royale (2006)
programme.desc: The saga of James Bond, agent 007 of Her Majesty's Secret Service, is given a fresh injection of high-octane thrills with this reboot of the spy series starring Daniel Craig as a newly minted, wet-nosed "blunt instrument" assigned his first mission: take down the sinister La Chiffre, an international arms dealer selling dangerous weapons to terrorists. Eva Green and Judi Dench costar in this box office blockbuster that relaunches the Bond franchise(n)

programme.title: Twin Peaks: Fire Walk With Me
programme.desc: In a town where nothing is as it seems - and everyone has something to hide - this prequel to the television drama series chronicles the seven days leading up to the brutal murder of Laura Palmer in a small logging town in the Pacific Northwest. Written and directed by David Lynch and starring Kyle MacLachlan, Sheryl Lee, Heather Graham, David Bowie, Chris Isaak, Harry Dean Stanton, Kiefer Sutherland and more(n)

programme.title: Jimi Hendrix: Electric Church
programme.desc: Documentary unveiling previously unseen footage of Jimi Hendrix's seminal performance at the 1970 Atlanta Pop Festival playing his greatest hits in front of 300,000 people. Features interviews with Hendrix, and fellow musicians, including Paul McCartney and Mitch Mitchell, who provide new insight into the musician's personality and genius at the juncture of this important cultural gathering, hailed as the 'Southern Woodstock'(n)

programme.title: Sweet Micky for President
programme.desc: Documentary that follows Grammy® Award winning Pras Michel of The Fugees as he returns to his homeland and mobilizes a presidential campaign for Haiti's most popular and outlandish pop star, Sweet Micky. The idealistic and politically inexperienced pair set out against a corrupt government, civil unrest, and a fixed election system to change the course of Haitian history(n)

programme.title: The Muppet Movie
programme.desc: Kermit the Frog - along with Fozzie Bear, Miss Piggy, Gonzo and a motley crew of Muppets - embarks on a cross-country trip to find fame in Hollywood while eluding the grasp of a relentless frog-leg restauranteur(n)

programme.title: Scrooged
programme.desc: Christmas Eve hijinks put Frank Cross (Bill Murray) in a ghostly time warp in this take-off of Charles Dickens' "A Christmas Carol." Cross, who has made the meteoric rise from the depths of the mailroom to TV network president, is a modern-day Scrooge. Before the night is over he'll be visited by a maniacal New York cab driver from the past, a present-day fairy who's into pratfalls and, finally, a ghoulish, seven-foot headless messenger from the future(n)

programme.title: Miami Vice
programme.desc: Jamie Foxx and Colin Farrell star as undercover detectives who get involved in a case of drug trafficking and murder in South Florida that takes a personal turn(n)

programme.title: People Like Us
programme.desc: Sam (Chris Pine) is a twenty-something, fast-talking salesman whose latest deal collapses the day he learns his father has suddenly died. Against his wishes, Sam is called home to put his father's estate in order and reconnect with his estranged family. While there, he uncovers a startling secret that turns his entire world upside down - he has a 30-year-old sister (Elizabeth Banks) he never knew existed. Michelle Pfeiffer and Oliva Wilde co-star in this smart and witty drama(n)

programme.title: America's Sweethearts
programme.desc: For an awkward, self-conscious girl like Kiki (Julia Roberts), being the personal assistant to a beautiful megastar like Gwen (Catherine Zeta-Jones) is no bowl of cherries. But when she reluctantly accepts the task of helping Gwen and her estranged husband (John Cusack) make it through one last public appearance - masterminded by legendary press agent Lee Phillips (Billy Crystal) - Kiki finds her job satisfaction plummeting(n)

programme.title: The Man Who Knew Infinity
programme.desc: Dev Patel stars in this story of the life and academic career of the pioneer Indian mathematician, Srinivasa Ramanujan, who leaves his home country and his young bride to travel to Trinity College in England in 1931 and despite his brilliance and the help of an eccentric mentor, must fight to prove himself and his theories to the establishment. Co-stars Jeremy Irons(n)

programme.title: Pet
programme.desc: Psychological thriller about a lonely man who bumps into an old crush and subsequently becomes obsessed with her, leading him to hold her captive underneath the animal shelter where he works. But she is not who she seems to be - and his reason to lock her up may not be as crazy as originally thought(n)

programme.title: Garm Wars: The Last Druid
programme.desc: In a world where clone soldiers from three military tribes are locked in a perpetual battle of air, land and technology, one clone is separated from the battle and finds herself on a quest for the truth with an unlikely trio

programme.title: The Death of "Superman Lives": What Happened?
programme.desc: A documentary that delves into the almost making of Hollywood movie "Superman Lives". In 1996, Warner Brothers hired director Tim Burton to assemble an elite group of artists, including Nicolas Cage as the titular hero, and what follows is "never quite made it" movie history

programme.title: The Last Survivors
programme.desc: In a futuristic world where society has collapsed and water is scarce, a 17-year-old girl decides to take on the henchmen of a greedy water baron, who is violently laying claim to the precious resources that are left

programme.title: The Day
programme.desc: A group of people working to stay alive in a post-apocalyptic future discover what they think is a safe, abandoned farmhouse, but they soon find themselves fighting to stay alive as a gang of bloodthirsty predators attack

programme.title: Star Kid

programme.desc: When a young woman moves into a large Victorian home to become the caretaker to her aging, sickly grandmother, she soon finds herself sleepwalking and having strange visions and is forced to confront her family's darkest secrets before the evil presence in the house overtakes her sanity

programme.title: The Roost

Marg Helgenberger and William Hurt costar

programme.desc: A popular high school student is forced to hit the road after the brutal murder of his parents, setting him on a path to the ominous town of Lupine Ridge to find out the truth of his ancestry(n)

programme.title: American Jihad
programme.desc: Documentary probe into the phenomenon of home-grown Jihadism, analyzing the strategic outreach and tactics employed by terrorists in order to reach susceptible members of society and what can be done to prevent it. Featuring intimate stories from former Jihadists radicalized to commit violent acts of terrorism and their families and communities caught in the crosshairs(n)

programme.title: Lenny Cooke
programme.desc: In an era when high school stars were forgoing college hoops in favor of the multi-million dollar contracts promised in the NBA draft, Lenny was supposed to be the next superstar. But over a decade later, while his peers are taking home MVP awards and championship trophies, Lenny has never played a minute in the NBA. What went wrong? A quintessentially American story about dreaming big, the fickle nature of sports celebrity and the unfulfilled destiny of a man for whom superstardom was only just out of reach(n)

programme.title: Saw
programme.desc: A surprise box office smash, this grisly horror tale terrified audiences with its story of two men (Cary Elwes and Leigh Whannell) who awaken imprisoned in the lair of a serial killer nicknamed Jigsaw, who plays vicious mind-games with his victims until he can manipulate them into killing each other. Meanwhile, a pair of desperate detectives (Danny Glover and Ken Leung) try to find the kidnapper before he can carve up his next pair of victims

programme.title: Nick Cannon: Stand Up, Don't Shoot
programme.desc: Comedian Nick Cannon is back - and using his potent voice to attack the haters and naysayers, while discussing everything from the controversial times we're living in to how getting old affects his dating. Plus, there's Nick's scoop on how a trip to Australia was the straw that broke his marriage to Mariah Carey's back. Filmed live at the Ebony Repertory Theatre in South Central Los Angles

programme.title: Sexual Sanctuary
programme.desc: Psychological thriller about an English couple who are invited to a strange villa where nothing is as it seems. After a series of desperate moves and sexual advances by the villa's inhabitants, will Aaron and Katie figure out what's really going on or will their new infatuations blind them from the truth?

programme.title: The Nasty Show hosted by Artie Lange
programme.desc: In this comedy special, the legendary Artie Lange hosts a line up of the most deranged and hilarious minds in comedy that's not for the faint of heart. Features Mike Wilmot, Mike Ward, Gina Yashere, Luenell, Jimmy Carr and Gilbert Gottfried

programme.title: Hesher
programme.desc: Joseph Gordon-Levitt stars as in this coming-of-age story as a metal head who unexpectedly enters the life of a grieving family and takes on the unlikely role of helping a 13-year-old boy cope with the death of his mother

programme.title: Premonition (2007)
programme.desc: The world of a suburban wife and mother (Sandra Bullock) is shattered when her husband is killed in a car accident. But reality soon begins warping, bouncing her through time before and after his death - and giving her a chance to change her family's fate. Julian McMahon, Nia Long, Kate Nelligan, Peter Stormare and Amber Valletta costar in this mind-bending thriller

programme.title: Mighty Joe Young
programme.desc: The beautiful daughter (Charlize Theron) of a slain scientist raises a rare two-ton mountain gorilla in the jungles of Africa, but allows a safari leader (Bill Paxton) to bring the giant beast to Los Angeles in order to save him from a poacher who is obsessed with capturing the mythical creature. Regina King costars in this family fantasy, a modern-day remake of the 1949 classic

programme.title: Behold the Monkey
programme.desc: A well-intentioned pensioner restores a fresco in a small Spanish town

programme.title: Meru
programme.desc: In the high-stakes game of big-wall climbing, the Shark's Fin on Mount Meru may be the ultimate prize. In this documentary three close friends - who are among the world's best professional climbers - battle their complicated pasts, inner demons and nature's harshest elements in an attempt to confront what is arguably the most technically complicated and dangerous peak in the Himalayas - one that has never been scaled to completion

programme.title: The Land
programme.desc: Teenage buddies Cisco (Jorge Lendeborg Jr.), Junior (Moises Arias), Boobie (Ezri Walker), and Patty Cake (Rafi Gavron) shrug off school to practice skateboarding, which they hope will be their ticket to a better life. But when they get mixed up in a drug deal and cross a ruthless crime queen-pin (Linda Emond), they put their friendship—and lives—on the line. Set to a hip-hop soundtrack and featuring an ensemble cast that includes Michael K. Williams, Erykah Badu and rapper Machine Gun Kelly

programme.title: Maz Jobrani: I'm Not a Terrorist But I've Played One on TV
programme.desc: Comedian Maz Jobrani follows up his bestselling book with a hilarious comedy special of the same title, where he takes on political issues, social issues and his kids through the lens of his Iranian-American background to show that we have a lot more in common than we think

programme.title: Dirty Weekend
programme.desc: Mathew Broderick stars as an uptight man who is stranded in a city where a year earlier, had too many drinks and had an unexpected encounter that haunts him. With his female coworker at his side, he sets out to figure out what happened that night. Directed by Neil Labute

programme.title: Bad Ass 3: Bad Asses on the Bayou
programme.desc: Action film series starring Danny Glover and Danny Trejo as senior heroes who visit Louisiana for a wedding escape only to encounter violence and mayhem, and once again, must pursue their own form of justice

programme.title: Last Girl Standing
programme.desc: Five years after surviving a brutal massacre, the lone survivor struggles to reclaim her shattered life. But just when she thinks she might finally be ready to start anew, the past comes back to haunt her

programme.title: Sleeping with Other People
programme.desc: Twelve years after a one-night stand in college, two New Yorkers (Alison Brie and Jason Sudeikis) meet by chance and discover they each have the same problem: because of their monogamy-challenged ways, neither can maintain a relationship. Determined to stay friends despite their mutual attraction, they make a pact to keep it platonic, a deal that proves easier said than done. Amanda Peet, Adam Scott and Natasha Lyonne co-star

programme.title: The Preppie Connection
programme.desc: Thomas Mann stars as a working class prodigy who enters the elite corridors of a prep school in his home town and vies for acceptance into the world of privilege, while trying to charm the beautiful and elusive girl of his dreams, but finds that the way in with the preppy crowd comes at a steep cost

programme.title: The Land
programme.desc: Teenage buddies Cisco (Jorge Lendeborg Jr.), Junior (Moises Arias), Boobie (Ezri Walker), and Patty Cake (Rafi Gavron) shrug off school to practice skateboarding, which they hope will be their ticket to a better life. But when they get mixed up in a drug deal and cross a ruthless crime queen-pin (Linda Emond), they put their friendship—and lives—on the line. Set to a hip-hop soundtrack and featuring an ensemble cast that includes Michael K. Williams, Erykah Badu and rapper Machine Gun Kelly

programme.title: The Riot Club
programme.desc: A first year student at Oxford University is invited to join the infamous Riot Club, where reputations can be made or destroyed over the course of a single drunken, debauched and disturbing evening with dangerous consequences

programme.title: The Hateful Eight
programme.desc: Eight strangers seek refuge from a blizzard in this Western mystery from writer and director Quentin Tarantino. Features an all-star cast, including Samuel L. Jackson, Kurt Russell and Jennifer Jason Leigh

programme.title: Attack of the Lederhosen Zombies
programme.desc: When a scientific experiment unleashes an epidemic of zombies in the Alps, a trio of snowboarders find themselves in a battle for survival where they must use their snowboarding skills to defeat the aprés-ski undead once and for all

programme.title: The Death of "Superman Lives": What Happened?
programme.desc: A documentary that delves into the almost making of Hollywood movie "Superman Lives". In 1996, Warner Brothers hired director Tim Burton to assemble an elite group of artists, including Nicolas Cage as the titular hero, and what follows is "never quite made it" movie history(c)

programme.title: Star Kid
programme.desc: A dorky seventh grader who spends his days avoiding the class bully and dreaming of becoming a comic book hero gets to try on the superpower he's always wanted when an extraterrestrial spacecraft crashes on earth

programme.title: ONE & DONE/BEN SIMMONS
programme.desc: SHOWTIME Sports chronicles the sprawling journey of number one NBA draft pick Ben Simmons. From a relatively anonymous Australian upbringing to high school and college in America to the top of the rookie class in the world's foremost basketball league, ONE & DONE chronicles a pivotal period in a young man's life, capturing Simmons and his inner circle as they realize a lifelong dream in the limelight of an exclusive fraternity of top NBA draft picks

programme.title: Cinderella Man
programme.desc: Russell Crowe and Renée Zellweger star in this inspiring tale of a promising boxer who battles the odds and a heavyweight champion to support his family during the Depression. Academy Award® winner Ron Howard directs

programme.title: The Man Who Knew Infinity
programme.desc: Dev Patel stars in this story of the life and academic career of the pioneer Indian mathematician, Srinivasa Ramanujan, who leaves his home country and his young bride to travel to Trinity College in England in 1931 and despite his brilliance and the help of an eccentric mentor, must fight to prove himself and his theories to the establishment. Co-stars Jeremy Irons

programme.title: Cry Freedom
programme.desc: Sweeping epic set in apartheid-era South Africa about white journalist Donald Woods (Kevin Kline), who is forced to flee the country after attempting to investigate the death of black activist Stephen Biko (Denzel Washington)

programme.title: Freedom
programme.desc: Two men are separated by time and united by their search for freedom in this tale of a slave escaping via the underground railroad in the 1800s and a sea captain setting sail one hundred year's earlier, with a ship full of slaves that will set in a motion an unstoppable legacy. Stars Cuba Gooding Jr

programme.title: Burn Motherf*cker, Burn!
programme.desc: On April 29, 1992, Los Angeles exploded when four police officers were acquitted in the beating of Rodney King. But the city had been smoldering for years. This provocative documentary looks at how decades of racial tensions, injustice and a troubled relationship between the LAPD and the African-American community led to the uprising. Local residents, artists and community organizers share firsthand accounts of police brutality, the ‘65 Watts riots, the rise of LA street gangs and the ‘92 incident

programme.title: Bridge of Spies
programme.desc: Tom Hanks stars in this dramatic thriller, inspired by true events, as a Brooklyn lawyer who finds himself thrust into the center of the Cold War when the CIA sends him on a near impossible mission to negotiate the release of a captured American pilot. Also stars Mark Rylance(n)

programme.title: The Man Who Knew Infinity
programme.desc: Dev Patel stars in this story of the life and academic career of the pioneer Indian mathematician, Srinivasa Ramanujan, who leaves his home country and his young bride to travel to Trinity College in England in 1931 and despite his brilliance and the help of an eccentric mentor, must fight to prove himself and his theories to the establishment. Co-stars Jeremy Irons(n)

programme.title: Mr. Brooks
programme.desc: Kevin Costner stars in this unusual psychological thriller as Earl Brooks, a doting husband and father, a successful businessman, and an award-winning philanthropist. Earl is beloved by his family and community, so nobody suspects that he is also a notorious, deranged serial killer who is under pressure from a zealously determined female detective (Demi Moore) and a sleazy photographer (Dane Cook) with evidence of his crimes. Marg Helgenberger and William Hurt costar(n)

programme.title: Alpha Dog
programme.desc: A thuggish group of privileged LA teenagers kidnap the younger brother of a junkie who refuses to pay his drug debt and take the kid to Palm Springs. Stars Justin Timberlake and Bruce Willis(n)

programme.title: Weiner
programme.desc: Documentary featuring a jaw-dropping, behind-the-scenes look at the attempted comeback of Anthony Weiner in 2013 as he mounts a campaign for New York City mayor in the wake of his sexting scandal. But it's not long before history repeats itself and new sexting allegations leave Weiner and his aides scrambling to contain the damage. Featuring unfettered access to the candidate and his campaign. Winner of the 2016 Sundance Grand Jury Prize for U.S. Documentary(n)

programme.title: Mighty Joe Young
programme.desc: The beautiful daughter (Charlize Theron) of a slain scientist raises a rare two-ton mountain gorilla in the jungles of Africa, but allows a safari leader (Bill Paxton) to bring the giant beast to Los Angeles in order to save him from a poacher who is obsessed with capturing the mythical creature. Regina King costars in this family fantasy, a modern-day remake of the 1949 classic(n)

A short story by Stephen King becomes this horror hit about a travel writer (John Cusack) who spends his nights debunking haunted hotel rooms - until he encounters one legendary site that turns out to be the real, terrifying deal. Samuel L. Jackson and Mary McCormack costar in this chilling adaptation(n)

programme.title: Adolf Hitler: The Artist
programme.desc: Satirical comedy starring Iwan Rheon and Rupert Grint that reimagines the megalomaniac dictator as an 18-year-old oddball who dreams of nothing other than becoming a famous painter(n)

programme.title: To Catch A Thief
programme.desc: When a reformed jewel thief is suspected of returning to his former occupation, he must ferret out the real thief in order to prove his innocence. Cary Grant and Grace Kelly star in this classic Alfred Hitchcock thriller(n)

programme.title: A Civil Action
programme.desc: John Travolta stars as Jan Schlichtmann, a cynical, high-priced personal injury attorney who only takes big-money cases he can safely settle out of court. Though his latest case appears straightforward, Jan soon becomes entangled in an epic legal battle on behalf of his clients - one where he's willing to put his career, reputation and all that he owns on the line. Robert Duvall, William H. Macy and John Lithgow co-star(n)

programme.title: Tenderness
programme.desc: A confused fifteen-year-old dreamer in search of an escape from her troubled home life becomes enthralled with a young man with a violent past and embarks on a dangerous road trip. Stars Russell Crowe and Sophie Traub(n)

programme.title: Born To Be Blue
programme.desc: Ethan Hawke stars as jazz legend Chet Baker in this biopic that zeroes in on a key moment in the 1960s, just as the all-but-washed-up musician attempts to stage a comeback, spurred in part by a passionate romance with a new flame(n)

A short story by Stephen King becomes this horror hit about a travel writer (John Cusack) who spends his nights debunking haunted hotel rooms - until he encounters one legendary site that turns out to be the real, terrifying deal. Samuel L. Jackson and Mary McCormack costar in this chilling adaptation(n)

programme.title: I Am Number Four
programme.desc: The new kid in town (Alex Pettyfer) is a nomad who discovers, when mysterious assassins track him down, that he's from a lot farther away than he ever knew. Dianna Agron and Timothy Olyphant costar in this sci-fi teen thriller

programme.title: Shaquille O'Neal Presents: All Star Comedy Jam: Live From Sin City
programme.desc: Comedian and actor Lavell Crawford (Breaking Bad) hosts this installment of Shaquille O'Neal's All Star Comedy Jam franchise in Las Vegas, featuring comedy veteran Earthquake who teams up with Cocoa Brown, K-Dubb, and Donell Rawlings to deliver a hilarious night of comedy

programme.title: Captivity
programme.desc: A supermodel is kidnapped and imprisoned in a cell by an obsessed psychopath, then subjected to horrific mental and physical torture in this controversial horror film starring Elisha Cuthbert and Pruitt Taylor Vince, directed by Roland Joffe

programme.title: Lost Highway
programme.desc: Bill Pullman plays Fred Madison, a man who begins receiving disturbing video tapes of him and his wife (Patricia Arquette) sleeping. When the final tape shows Fred murdering his wife he is sent off to death row. Here Fred inexplicably becomes young Pete Dayton (Balthazar Getty), who leads a completely different life. Ultimately, the two identities begin to cross paths in this surreal, suspenseful web of intrigue from director David Lynch

programme.title: Who's Your Caddy?
programme.desc: Denied membership in an exclusive Hamptons country club, the millionaire rapper C-Note (Antwan Andre Patton) pulls off a clever real estate deal that guarantees him admission but also touches off a war with the club's snobby elite. Jeffrey Jones, Andy Milonakis and Faizon Love costar in this hilarious comedy of golf, rap, and class tension

programme.title: Play It Forward

programme.title: A.R.C.H.I.E.
programme.desc: A recently orphaned 15-year-old who has moved to a small town to live with her uncle befriends a robotic canine with super strength, x-ray vision and the ability to talk and the pair take on a military complex, bullies, kidnappers, romance and the world

programme.title: Out of the Furnace
programme.desc: When Rodney Baze (Casey Affleck) mysteriously disappears and law enforcement doesn't follow through fast enough, his older brother, Russell (Christian Bale), takes matters into his own hands to seek justice

programme.desc: The SHOWTIME boxing series returns with a talented trio of prospects in separate bouts, including: super welterweight Chris Pearson, cruiserweight Andrew Tabiti and lightweight Saul Rodriguez all in separate bouts. REPLAY

programme.title: Bad Company (1995)
programme.desc: An icy new recruit (Laurence Fishburne) at a shadowy paramilitary outfit is making the company's normally unflappable co-owner (Ellen Barkin) very nervous in this crime thriller costarring Frank Langella, Michael Beach, Gia Carides, David Ogden Stiers and Daniel Hugh Kelly

programme.title: Legend of the Fist: The Return of Chen Zhen
programme.desc: A legendary Chinese hero, believed dead, returns to Shanghai in disguise and uses nefarious tactics to infiltrate a criminal empire and employs his martial arts skills to seek justice

programme.title: Pet
programme.desc: Psychological thriller about a lonely man who bumps into an old crush and subsequently becomes obsessed with her, leading him to hold her captive underneath the animal shelter where he works. But she is not who she seems to be - and his reason to lock her up may not be as crazy as originally thought

programme.title: A.R.C.H.I.E.

programme.title: Dennis Rodman's Big Bang in Pyongyang
programme.desc: Documentary chronicling flamboyant celebrity and former NBA basketballer Dennis Rodman's friendship with leader Kim Jong-un that sends him on a controversial mission to improve relations between North Korea and the US by staging a historic basketball game between the two countries. Despite nuclear threats, dissent and Rodman's personal struggles to keep it together, the game must go on

programme.title: Gringo: The Dangerous Life of John McAfee
programme.desc: Documentary about the bizarre and scandalous life of tech millionaire John McAfee - famed inventor of anti-virus software - who goes off the grid to live in Belize, building a compound and harem, becoming a drug lord and developing an armed security force to guard himself against the police until he is a suspect in his neighbor's murder and must make a great escape

programme.title: Miami Vice
programme.desc: Jamie Foxx and Colin Farrell star as undercover detectives who get involved in a case of drug trafficking and murder in South Florida that takes a personal turn

programme.title: Pele: Birth of a Legend
programme.desc: Biographical drama telling the miraculous story of Pelé, the legendary soccer player who rose to fame from the slums of Sao Paulo to lead Brazil to its first ever World Cup victory in 1958 at the age of 17

programme.title: Against the Tide
programme.desc: A Showtime Sports chronicle of the seminal 1970 college football matchup between Alabama's Crimson Tide and USC Trojans at Birmingham's Legion Field. Through interviews with former Alabama legends Joe Namath, John Mitchell and USC stars Sam "Bam" Cunningham, Jimmy Jones and more, this documentary examines coach Paul "Bear" Bryant's surprising decision to bring a dominant, racially integrated football team onto the field in Birmingham for the very first time and reveals the impact college football played in the struggle for integration

programme.title: Learning Curve
programme.desc: What has President Trump learned from his first 100 days in office? As Congress reconvenes, Mark McKinnon and John Heilemann head to Capitol Hill to find out. Mark Halperin is in New York City to get Wall Street’s perspective(n)

programme.title: My Nation
programme.desc: The internet was hailed for democratizing ideas. But it is also an arena where conspiracy theories and polarizing echo chambers thrive. In this episode, meet an Alt-Right organizer who's using his social network to urge online sympathizers to join his real world rebellion; the desperate parents of a 17-year-old girl, brainwashed into posting White Nationalist YouTube videos; plus, an American-born former Al-Qaeda recruiter who's had a prolific effect on support for jihad(n)

programme.title: Trout vs. Rodriguez (R)
programme.desc: America's number-one boxing network delivers epic battles featuring Sam Peter, Rafael Marquez, Antonio Tarver, Chad Dawson and other top contenders. Only SHOWTIME delivers the heart-pounding, action-packed live fights boxing fans crave. No wonder ESPN.com raves, "...if you're a serious fight fan, you must have Showtime!"(n)

programme.title: Another Day in Paradise
programme.desc: The bond holding a dysfunctional pseudo-family together is drug addiction in this unflinching, critically acclaimed drama, the sophomore production of filmmaker Larry Clark. James Woods, Melanie Griffith, Vincent Kartheiser, Nathasha Gregson Wagner and James Otis star(n)

programme.title: Shark Babes
programme.desc: A group of sexy marine biologists discover how sharks emit an erotic sound that no woman can resist. But will their research take them to new heights or simply turn them into shark babes bent on overthrowing mankind with sensuality?(n)

programme.title: The Drew
programme.desc: The incredible story of the unlikely rise of The Drew League from humble beginnings in the crime and gang infested streets of South Central Los Angeles to the nation's foremost pro-am basketball league. Crossing racial, cultural and socioeconomic barriers, The Drew celebrates the value of basketball, persistence, loyalty and above all, community. Featuring NBA stars Kevin Durant, DeMar DeRozan, Brandon Jennings and Baron Davis(n)

As a semi-finalist, he transforms into an audience favorite - but in his rise to the top, will he forget what matters most?

programme.title: Orange County

programme.title: The Hunters

programme.title: Hidalgo

programme.title: Black Filmmaker Showcase: Among Thieves
programme.desc: Hiding out from the police, a thief meets a bedridden senior citizen who begs him to end her life in this short from filmmaker Oscar Daniels

programme.title: Whiskers
programme.desc: Eleven-year-old Jed (Michael Caloz) arranges for the Egyptian goddess of felines to turn his cuddly cat into a kid. However, since cat years and human years figure differently, "Whiskers" is now a thirty-year-old man. Jacob Tierney costars in this cat comedy

programme.title: Love The Coopers
programme.desc: In this all-star cast holiday movie, four generations of extended family gather for an annual Christmas Eve celebration and as the evening unfolds, a series of unexpected visitors and unlikely events turn the night upside down. Starring John Goodman, Diane Keaton, Marisa Tomei, Alan Arkin, Olivia Wilde and Ed Helms

programme.title: Walking on Sunshine
programme.desc: Love, sun, lust and 80s hit songs collide in this musical romantic comedy set on the stunning coast of Italy, where a young woman is on the precipice of marrying her gorgeous fiancé, not knowing he had a fling with her sister

programme.title: Miss Potter
programme.desc: Renee Zellweger stars in this biography of "Peter Rabbit" author Beatrix Potter, an artist stuck in a Victorian, turn-of-the-century era when young women are expected to find suitable husbands, not spend hours writing and illustrating children's stories about bunnies. Frustrated at her efforts to publish her work and find a suitable mate, Potter is shocked when to find both in the same person: a publisher (Ewan McGregor) who takes her and her work seriously. Emily Watson costars in this sweetly charming film

programme.title: The Accidental Spy
programme.desc: Jackie Chan stars in this globe-trotting adventure as a sporting goods salesman whose dream of being an international spy comes true when he foils a bank robbery and is recruited to search for a missing person in Korea, where he uncovers a plot involving a hidden fortune and a stolen weapon of mass destruction. Eric Tsang and Vivian Hsu costar

programme.title: Down To Earth
programme.desc: Chris Rock is struggling comedian Lance Burton, who is taken long before his time by an anxious angel and finds temporary refuge back on Earth in the body of a prejudiced, white millionaire. Soon Lance ("Charles" to those who only know him by his new identity) is wooing a community rights activist (Regina King) and dodging a bullet as his wife and her lover try to kill him

programme.title: Forbidden Kingdom
programme.desc: A young martial arts enthusiast travels back in time to ancient China, where he teams up with a drunken master and a beautiful warrior maiden to fight an evil wizard and free the mythical "Monkey King." Legendary action stars Jackie Chan and Jet Li finally unite for this fun-filled adventure

programme.title: Perfect in '76
programme.desc: SHOWTIME documentary revisiting the ‘76 Hoosiers and renowned coach Bobby Knight, who led his Indiana team to a perfect 32-0 season and a national championship

programme.title: Spy Kids: Game Over
programme.desc: Under-age agents Juni and Carmen Cortez journey inside the virtual reality world of a 3-D video game designed to outsmart them, as the awe-inspiring graphics and creatures of gaming come to real life. Relying on lightning-quick reflexes, the Spy Kids must battle through tougher and tougher levels of the game, facing challenges that include racing against road warriors and surfing on boiling lava, in order to save the world from a power hungry villain

programme.title: The Muppet Movie
programme.desc: Kermit the Frog - along with Fozzie Bear, Miss Piggy, Gonzo and a motley crew of Muppets - embarks on a cross-country trip to find fame in Hollywood while eluding the grasp of a relentless frog-leg restauranteur

programme.title: Furry Vengeance
programme.desc: A real estate developer (Brendan Fraser) discovers that Mother Nature is sometimes best left unmolested when his attempt to build a massive new subdivision in Oregon is opposed by an army of clever critters led by a raccoon. Brooke Shields and Ken Jeong costar in this family comedy

Paul Rodriguez costars in this warmly funny follow-up

programme.desc: Richard Farnsworth and Sissy Spacek star in director David Lynch's tale of Alvin Straight, an elderly man who makes a long journey by lawn mower to mend a relationship with his estranged brother(n)

programme.title: When Time Expires
programme.desc: If futuristic time traveler Richard Grieco fails to place a quarter in a parking meter at precisely the right moment, a series of chain reactions will ultimately result in the destruction of Earth in this sci-fi action thriller costarring Chad Everett and Mark Hamill(n)

programme.title: Scenarios USA Shorts: Veracity
programme.desc: Two teenage girls are outed at high school for being gay and are faced with difficult choices about their friendship, their sexual identity and themselves in this short film directed by Seith Mann and written by Janaya Greene(n)

programme.title: Latino Filmmaker Showcase: Wilbur
programme.desc: A lonely, stuttering London baker who is still something of a mama's boy despite being his thirties pines for love in this quirky comedy from AFI student Dago Rodriguez(n)

programme.title: Latino Filmmaker Showcase: Candy and Brandy
programme.desc: A couple's relationship endures a dramatic confrontation that leads to a painful breakup - a situation most notable for the fact that they are portrayed by children in this award-winning tone poem from Spanish filmmaker Ander Duque(n)

programme.title: Pele: Birth of a Legend
programme.desc: Biographical drama telling the miraculous story of Pelé, the legendary soccer player who rose to fame from the slums of Sao Paulo to lead Brazil to its first ever World Cup victory in 1958 at the age of 17(n)

programme.title: Ronnie & Julie
programme.desc: Teenagers who meet thanks to a mutual interest in ice-skating (he's a hockey player, she's a figure skater) proceed to fall head over heels in love, jeopardizing a local election for their rival political families. Joshua Jackson and Margot Finlay star with Teri Garr and Alexandra Purvis in this contemporary reworking of Shakespeare's "Romeo and Juliet."(n)

programme.title: Dean Smith
programme.desc: Coach, mentor, social activist ...the life and legacy of Dean Smith, North Carolina's legendary basketball coach - who went to 11 Finals Fours and won two National Championships, with players like Michael Jordan, James Worthy, Vince Carter and Jerry Stackhouse - is remembered and celebrated by former players and colleagues(n)

programme.title: Hidalgo
programme.desc: Based on the true story of the greatest long-distance horse race ever run, this epic action-adventure set in 1890 follows a down-and-out cowboy who travels to Arabia to compete in a deadly cross-desert horse race. Stars Viggo Mortensen and Omar Sharif(n)

programme.title: All-Stars
programme.desc: Comedy about a veteran softball coach, who is saddled with a team of inexperienced 10-year-old girls and their overly ambitious, delusional parents(n)

programme.title: Ronnie & Julie
programme.desc: Teenagers who meet thanks to a mutual interest in ice-skating (he's a hockey player, she's a figure skater) proceed to fall head over heels in love, jeopardizing a local election for their rival political families. programme.title: 5 to 7
programme.desc: A young writer begins an affair with an older French woman, whose open marriage to a diplomat dictates that they can only meet for two hours each evening but their growing passion leads him to want more than just a fleeting romance

programme.title: Burnt
programme.desc: Bradley Cooper stars as a former top chef whose drug and alcohol habit led to a career meltdown but he gets a shot at redemption when his former maître d' hires him as the head of his fine-dining restaurant in London. Stars Sienna Miller and Daniel Brühl

programme.title: Don Jon
programme.desc: A dissatisfied lothario embarks on a journey to find a more gratifying sex life, but ends up learning larger lessons of life and love through relationships with two very different women

programme.title: America's Sweethearts
programme.desc: For an awkward, self-conscious girl like Kiki (Julia Roberts), being the personal assistant to a beautiful megastar like Gwen (Catherine Zeta-Jones) is no bowl of cherries. But when she reluctantly accepts the task of helping Gwen and her estranged husband (John Cusack) make it through one last public appearance - masterminded by legendary press agent Lee Phillips (Billy Crystal) - Kiki finds her job satisfaction plummeting

programme.title: Body
programme.desc: After three twenty-something girls break into a mansion and inadvertently murder the groundskeeper, they slowly self-destruct as they decide what to do with the dead body in the living room

programme.title: Scorned
programme.desc: When a woman discovers her boyfriend is cheating on her with her best friend, she plans a romantic weekend getaway for just the three of them, complete with terror, torture and twisted psychosexual games. Stars AnnaLynne McCord and Billy Zane

programme.title: In a Perfect World
programme.desc: Documentary that explores the dynamics of what it is to be a man raised by a single mother told through the lens of the director's own relationship with her solo-parented son. Features interviews with men of diverse backgrounds and ages, sharing painfully personal anecdotes in the wake of emotionally turbulent and unsettling periods of their youth. This story is both a deeply personal and introspective portrait of a modern family, as well as a probing cinematic essay examining one of society's major ailments

programme.title: Lucky Numbers
programme.desc: John Travolta stars in this comedy about a small-town Pennsylvania weatherman who schemes with his TV hostess girlfriend (Lisa Kudrow) to rip off their state's weekly lottery, with disastrous results. Ed O'Neill, Tim Roth, Michael Rapaport, Michael Moore and Bill Pullman costar in this wacky farce from director Nora Ephron ("When Harry Met Sally...," "You've Got Mail")

programme.title: Like Sunday, Like Rain
programme.desc: A 12-year-old rich kid cello prodigy wants for nothing but the attention of his absent parents until a young musician is hired as his au pair and an unexpected friendship blossoms. Stars Leighton Meester and Debra Messing

programme.title: The Architect
programme.desc: Parker Posey and Eric McCormack star in this comedy about a couple who set out to build a new home and enlist the services of an uncompromising modernist architect who proceeds to build his dream house, instead of theirs

programme.title: Casino Royale (2006)
programme.desc: The saga of James Bond, agent 007 of Her Majesty's Secret Service, is given a fresh injection of high-octane thrills with this reboot of the spy series starring Daniel Craig as a newly minted, wet-nosed "blunt instrument" assigned his first mission: take down the sinister La Chiffre, an international arms dealer selling dangerous weapons to terrorists. Eva Green and Judi Dench costar in this box office blockbuster that relaunches the Bond franchise

programme.desc: A confused fifteen-year-old dreamer in search of an escape from her troubled home life becomes enthralled with a young man with a violent past and embarks on a dangerous road trip. Stars Russell Crowe and Sophie Traub

programme.title: Fifty Shades of Black
programme.desc: Marlon Wayans stars as Christian Black in a comedy about a millionaire control freak who introduces shy college student Hannah Steele (Kali Hawk) to the world of "romance" after she interviews him for the school newspaper

programme.title: Girl on the Edge
programme.desc: A troubled teenager who falls victim to an online predator is sent to an experimental treatment center to recover from the trauma, where she fights the demons of the past with the help of her new friends and a rescued horse

programme.title: Winter Passing
programme.desc: In this dramatic comedy, Zooey Deschanel stars as a struggling twenty-something actress who goes in search of her legendary, reclusive novelist father and must wrestle with his unconventional new family and their shared past. Also stars Ed Harris and Will Ferrell

programme.title: Blood Sand
programme.desc: Sci-fi horror that centers around a group of hung over twenty-somethings who rise after a raging all-night graduation party to find the beach has turned into a carnivorous force that will devour anything with a heartbeat

programme.title: Black Filmmaker Showcase: Hit Me
programme.desc: A man must convince the professional assassin he hired to let him live in this short film from director Steve Minor

programme.title: Mighty Joe Young
programme.desc: The beautiful daughter (Charlize Theron) of a slain scientist raises a rare two-ton mountain gorilla in the jungles of Africa, but allows a safari leader (Bill Paxton) to bring the giant beast to Los Angeles in order to save him from a poacher who is obsessed with capturing the mythical creature. Regina King costars in this family fantasy, a modern-day remake of the 1949 classic

programme.title: Christmas Ranch
programme.desc: When a rebellious young girl is sent to stay on her grandmother's ranch for Christmas, a friendship with a pony alters the course of her life but when the ranch is threatened with foreclosure she must come up with a plan to save horse and home

programme.title: Miss Potter
programme.desc: Renee Zellweger stars in this biography of "Peter Rabbit" author Beatrix Potter, an artist stuck in a Victorian, turn-of-the-century era when young women are expected to find suitable husbands, not spend hours writing and illustrating children's stories about bunnies. Emily Watson costars in this sweetly charming film

programme.title: The Dramatics (A Comedy)
programme.desc: When an out-of-work actress unexpectedly lands a starring role in the sexually explicit mini-series adaptation of a best-selling erotic novel, her aimless, stoner boyfriend does his best to be supportive. But when her volatile, Oscar® winning co-lead takes "rehearsals" too far, her dream job becomes her boyfriend's worst nightmare and the couple is forced to decide whether or not their relationship is worth fighting for. Stars Pablo Schreiber

programme.desc: Kacy prays for divine intervention in her and Cori's quest to get pregnant; Saj's amorousness overwhelms Chanel; Romi's investment in her jewelry line pays off when when her work draws the interest of a major designer; Francine spreads the rumor that Claire thinks the other girls are losers, leading to a showdown; Rachel interviews for her dream job at Vidal Sassoon(n)

programme.title: The Hardest Time
programme.desc: Kacy and Cori splinter under the pressure of pregnancy problems; Whitney reaches out to Rachel just in time; Saj's mother arrives for a visit and gets a front-row seat to the lesbian lifestyle; Romi and Kelsey fracture over alcohol; Franny considers coming out to her traditional Japanese mother(n)

programme.title: The Pieces Fall Into Place
programme.desc: Whitney and Romi grapple with their feelings for each other; Kacy and Cori pursue what may be their last chance at making a baby; after her mother leaves, Sajdah realizes she did indeed move too fast with Chanel; Francine welcomes her mother to town and braces for coming out(n)

programme.title: Latino Filmmaker Showcase: Aniversario
programme.desc: An older man and his younger wife celebrate their wedding anniversary with a special dinner and a gift, but a game reveals the truth about their relationship(n)

programme.title: Meet the Hitlers
programme.desc: A documentary that examines the relationship between names and identity, by exploring the lives of people who are linked by the name Hitler. This character-driven story offers an intimate portrait of its subjects whose reactions to their name span the spectrum of human experience, from tragedy to comedy, and heartbreak to hope(n)

programme.title: Ping Pong Summer
programme.desc: In this coming of age comedy, a family vacation during the summer of 1985 changes everything for a shy teenage boy obsessed with ping pong(n)

programme.title: After Words
programme.desc: Academy Award® winner Marcia Gay Harden stars as a librarian who travels to Costa Rica to escape her mid-life crisis and finds herself on an unexpected journey filled with adventure and romance(n)

programme.title: Love The Coopers
programme.desc: In this all-star cast holiday movie, four generations of extended family gather for an annual Christmas Eve celebration and as the evening unfolds, a series of unexpected visitors and unlikely events turn the night upside down. Starring John Goodman, Diane Keaton, Marisa Tomei, Alan Arkin, Olivia Wilde and Ed Helms(n)

programme.title: Love Actually
programme.desc: This classic holiday romantic comedy interweaves the stories of nine contemporary Londoners, from the handsome bachelor Prime Minister who falls for a junior staffer to a schoolboy with a crush, as they wrestle with the funny, poignant and often silly side of love. Stars Laura Linney, Hugh Grant, Emma Thompson, Colin Firth and Alan Rickman(n)

programme.title: Jane Wants a Boyfriend
programme.desc: A bright-eyed young woman in her mid-20s living with autism, and enamored of old Hollywood romantic movies, decides she wants a boyfriend and when she meets a charming sous chef, it seems that true romance might be possible(n)

programme.title: After Words
programme.desc: Academy Award® winner Marcia Gay Harden stars as a librarian who travels to Costa Rica to escape her mid-life crisis and finds herself on an unexpected journey filled with adventure and romance(n)

programme.title: SXSW Comedy Night Two with W. Kamau Bell
programme.desc: Stand-up W. Kamua Bell hosts the hottest comics at the SXSW festival in the second of this two-part showcase featuring today's heavyweights and tomorrow's stars, including Todd Glass, Wyatt Cenac, Iliza Shlesinger, Rachel Feinstein, Nate Bargatze, Matt Braunger, Mark Normand, Beth Stelling, Joe DeRosa and Jon Huck(n)

programme.title: The Rage of Paris
programme.desc: Danielle Darrieux as a charming French model trying to make good in New York while evading a preying executive (Douglas Fairbanks Jr.) and a playboy (Louis Hayward). Gloria: Helen Broderick. Mike: Mischa Auer. Pops: Harry Davenport. Slightly spicy, highly amusing. Henry Koster directed

programme.title: La Ronde
programme.desc: Max Ophuls' concatenation of love affairs in turn-of-the-century Vienna. Anton Walbrook, Simone Signoret, Gerard Philipe, Danielle Darrieux, Daniel Gelin, Simone Simon, Jean-Louis Barrault, Isa Miranda, Serge Reggiani, Fernand Gravey

programme.title: The Earrings of Madame de...
programme.desc: A general's wife sells a pair of earrings, setting off a chain of lies and betrayals, ultimately exposing a love triangle

programme.title: Loss of Innocence
programme.desc: A 16-year-old English girl comes of age in the summertime while vacationing in France

programme.title: Une chambre en ville
programme.desc: A man falls madly in love with his landlady's daughter, but the young lady is married to a jealous man. (cc)

programme.title: Rich, Young and Pretty
programme.desc: A Texas woman vacationing in Paris falls in love with a handsome Frenchman and is reunited with her Gallic mother, whom she thought was dead

programme.title: Gambling on the High Seas
programme.desc: Yarn about a reporter (Wayne Morris) on the trail of gangsters who run a gambling ship. Jane Wyman. Morella: Gilbert Rolland. District Attorney: John Litel. Gates: Roger Pryor. Stone: Frank Wilcox

programme.title: The Tuttles of Tahiti
programme.desc: A large, carefree and devoted family in Tahiti lose big on a cockfighting wager but shrug off money problems with good cheer

programme.title: The Sin Ship
programme.desc: A schooner captain is forced to protect a female passenger from his sex-starved crew, and later he falls in love with her

programme.title: Miracle in the Rain
programme.desc: During a World War II, an ordinary-looking secretary meets a handsome soldier in Central Park and the two fall deeply in love, but tragedy strikes and she nearly falls apart, until one day while passing a cathedral a miracle occurs

programme.title: High Barbaree
programme.desc: A WWII pilot shares his life story with a companion after they are shot down over the Pacific. (cc)

programme.title: Romance on the High Seas
programme.desc: Spouses who don't trust each other each create a ruse to try and catch the other being unfaithful, resulting in a farcical series of romantic misunderstandings

programme.title: The Long Voyage Home
programme.desc: The lives of the crew who live aboard the freighter Glencairn are followed as they drink, womanize, fight and bond, sometimes searching for ways to cure boredom, and sometimes facing life or death situations

programme.title: Key Largo
programme.desc: An adaptation of the Maxwell Anderson play about a war-weary World War II vet forced into a confrontation with the nervous, sadistic mobster who is holding the occupants of a Florida hotel hostage during a hurricane. Claire Trevor won a Supporting Actress Oscar as the gangster's drunken moll. (cc)

programme.title: It Happened One Night
programme.desc: Frank Capra's classic about a spoiled heiress on the lam from her father, and the gruff reporter who hooks up with her as they travel northward, engage in a series of misadventures and begin to fall for each other. The first film to sweep all five major Oscars: Best Picture, Director (Capra), Screenplay (Robert Riskin), Actor (Clark Gable) and Actress (Claudette Colbert)

programme.title: No Man of Her Own
programme.desc: Familiar tale about the tough card shark (Clark Gable) who reforms for love. Carole Lombard, Dorothy Mackaill, Grant Mitchell, Elizabeth Patterson, Tommy Conlon, George Barbier, J. Farrell MacDonald. Wesley Ruggles directed

programme.title: Mutiny on the Bounty
programme.desc: A famous 1787 incident inspired this Best Picture winner about a clash of wills between tyrannical captain William Bligh and his mutinous mate Fletcher Christian aboard an 18th-century British merchantman in the South Seas. Clark Gable (Christian), Charles Laughton (Bligh) and Franchot Tone (Roger Byam) garnered Best Actor nominations

programme.title: Clark Gable Tall, Dark and Handsome

programme.desc: Emma's crying jag has Rachel nearly hysterical herself; Joey's effort to apologize for his semi-proposal proves all-too painful for Ross; and a sleep-deprived Chandler nods off in a staff meeting and wakes up with a nightmarish new job in Tulsa. Ms. McKenna: Janet Huber. Phoebe: Lisa Kudrow. (repeat)(n)

programme.title: Friends
programme.desc: Joey sets Phoebe up with a stranger (Paul Rudd) to score a date with one of her friends; Rachel catches Ross visiting his pediatrician from childhood; and a job offer stands between Monica and Chandler's relocation to Tulsa. Sally: Elaine Hendrix. Dr. Gettleman: Gregory White. Mary Ellen: Dedee Pfeiffer. (repeat)(n)

programme.title: Friends
programme.desc: Ross makes up a faux beau for Pheebs after telling her latest crush (Paul Rudd) too much about her lack of long-term loves. Meanwhile, Monica fears that Chandler is getting cheap thrills from nature documentaries; and Joey's convinced he is re-romancing a woman from his past who doesn't remember him. Hayley: Susan Ward. Poppy: Nikita Ager. Gunther: James Michael Tyler. Joey: Matt LeBlanc. (repeat)(n)

programme.desc: Nikki moves in with Kim and immediately throws her weight around, giving rise to tension between herself and her daughter. programme.title: The Parkers
programme.desc: Under the watchful eye of Professor Oglevee, Nikki, Stevie and T team up for an academic tournament. programme.title: The Parkers
programme.desc: Nikki, Kim, Stevie and T go into the T-shirt business but, when they can't agree on a slogan, T breaks off on his own. programme.title: Muzyczny rytm dnia
programme.desc: Wyjątkowe zestawienie przebojów, które dzięki swojej energii nadadzą widzom odpowiedni rytm dnia. Ta muzyka jest rytmem ich pulsu

programme.title: Godzina z...
programme.desc: Nowatorski program skierowany do miłośników muzyki oraz DIY. Klipy przeplatają się tu z krótkimi filmikami zawierającymi porady dotyczące codziennych czynności - od majsterkowania, przez gotowanie po make up. Tematyka porad jest bardzo bogata i różnorodna. Dzięki nim, widzowie dowiedzą się m.in. tego, jak przygotować peeling z cukru lub kawy, jak przyrządzić domowe chipsy czy wykonać żyrandol ze szklanej butelki. Efekt końcowy zaskoczy każdego

programme.title: Godzina z...
programme.desc: Nowatorski program skierowany do miłośników muzyki oraz DIY. Klipy przeplatają się tu z krótkimi filmikami zawierającymi porady dotyczące codziennych czynności - od majsterkowania, przez gotowanie po make up. Tematyka porad jest bardzo bogata i różnorodna. Dzięki nim, widzowie dowiedzą się m.in. tego, jak przygotować peeling z cukru lub kawy, jak przyrządzić domowe chipsy czy wykonać żyrandol ze szklanej butelki. Efekt końcowy zaskoczy każdego

programme.title: Trinny i Susannah ubierają Danię
programme.desc: Brytyjskie ekspertki stylu Trinny Woodall i Susannah Constantine podróżują po całym świecie, pomagając zaniedbanym kobietom przeobrazić się w ikony stylu. Znawczynie kobiecej mody uczą panie, jak dobrze wyglądać. Ich misją jest wpojenie zasad dobrego stylu i rozsądnego podążania za modą. W tej serii Trinny i Susannah oceniają styl Dunek. W każdym odcinku spotykają się z kobietami o różnych modowych upodobaniach oraz gustach. Doradzają im oraz pomagają dobrać buty, dodatki, stroje odpowiednie dla ich sylwetki, typu urody i stylu życia. Specjalistki współpracują z doskonałymi fryzjerami, wizażystami i projektantami, by zmienić zwykłe kobiety w prawdziwe modelki

programme.title: Jej Szerokość Afrodyta
programme.desc: Kolejna odsłona serialu o perypetiach pięknej modelki Deb, która zginęła w wypadku samochodowym i powróciła na ziemię w ciele pulchnej prawniczki Jane Bingum (Brooke Elliott). Pod nową postacią dwie osobowości kobiety muszą nauczyć się koegzystować. Deb, dla której przed wypadkiem świat koncentrował się wokół nieskazitelnego wyglądu, przechodzi równie spektakularną wewnętrzną metamorfozę. Jane robi co może, by ocalić mężczyznę niesłusznie skazanego na karę śmierci. Czasu jest coraz mniej. Z kolei Kim reprezentuje kameralną szkołę tańca, która toczy spór ze znanym gwiazdorem

programme.title: Jasnowidząca Wanga
programme.desc: Historia życia Wangeliji Pandewej Dimitrowej słynnej niewidomej bułgarskiej mistyczki i znachorki, która przewidziała wiele ważnych i przełomowych dla świata wydarzeń. Wśród jej przepowiedni są m.in.: wybuch II wojny światowej i data dojścia Hitlera do władzy, śmierć Stalina, zatonięcie okrętu podwodnego Kursk czy atak terrorystów na World Trade Center w Nowym Jorku. Serial przybliża postać tej niezwykłej, posiadającej wyjątkową moc kobiety. Do 30-letniej Wangi przychodzi kobieta, której córka jest umierająca. Dowiaduje się, jak przygotować uzdrawiający napar. O pomoc prosi również młody żołnierz. Wanga odkrywa jego prawdziwe intencje

programme.title: Moje szalone włoskie wesele
programme.desc: Seria opowiada o pełnych przepychu, ekstrawaganckich weselach we Włoszech. W każdym odcinku kamera przygląda się przygotowaniom różnych par do ich wielkiego święta. Okazuje się, że niektórzy zakochani wydają majątek, by tego dnia zaimponować rodzinie lub spełnić swoje najbardziej osobliwe zachcianki. Niektóre pomysły wydają się bardzo zaskakujące

programme.title: Moje szalone włoskie wesele
programme.desc: Seria opowiada o pełnych przepychu, ekstrawaganckich weselach we Włoszech. W każdym odcinku kamera przygląda się przygotowaniom różnych par do ich wielkiego święta. Okazuje się, że niektórzy zakochani wydają majątek, by tego dnia zaimponować rodzinie lub spełnić swoje najbardziej osobliwe zachcianki. Niektóre pomysły wydają się bardzo zaskakujące

programme.title: Prognoza pogody
programme.desc: Program informacyjny

programme.title: Transporter
programme.desc: Kolejna część przygód Franka Martina (Chris Vance), byłego agenta służb specjalnych, obecnie kuriera. Kieruje się on trzema zasadami: nigdy nie zmienia warunków umowy, nie zagląda do przesyłek i nie chce znać żadnych nazwisk. Jako wytrawny kierowca, mistrz sztuk walki i specjalista od survivalu, Frank nie narzeka na brak zleceń. Pomagają mu zaufani ludzie: specjalistka informatyczna Carla (Andrea Osvárt), mechanik Dieter (Charly Hübner) i zaprzyjaźniony inspektor policji Tarconi (François Berléand). Serialowa wersja przygód Franka Martina, niekonwencjonalnego kuriera wykreowanego przez Luca Bessona w przeboju kina akcji "Transporter" z 2002 roku

programme.title: Kochanie, zabijamy dzieciaki
programme.desc: Psycholog dziecięca Kris Murrin pomoże 7-letniemu Michaelowi, synowi Almy i Iana Reynoldsów. Specjalistka zastąpi smażone obiady i niezdrowe przekąski pięcioma porcjami warzyw i owoców. Ponadto zapisuje swojego podopiecznego na zajęcia judo. Chłopiec ma również nauczyć się jeździć na rowerze. Ekspertka zadba także o poprawienie relacji społecznych - Michael zostaje członkiem osiedlowego klubu. Zdradza ponadto, jak w ciekawy sposób spędzać czas wolny. Za jej sprawą rodzice zaczynają uczęszczać na kurs tańca i urządzają przyjęcie dla znajomych

programme.title: Profil
programme.desc: Francuski serial kryminalny opowiadający o pracy w wydziale paryskiej policji, który specjalizuje się w poszukiwaniu sprawców morderstw. Do zespołu dołącza utalentowana psycholog Chloé Saint-Laurent (Odile Vuillemin), traktowana na początku z rezerwą przez funkcjonariuszy. Szybko jednak okazuje się, że ta niepozorna młoda kobieta jest znakomitym profilerem. Dzięki niezwykłej wrażliwości wnika w umysły morderców i ich ofiar. Zdolność ta sprawia, że Chloé bardzo skutecznie pomaga policji. Jej pierwsza sprawa dotyczy morderstwa dziewczyny, która została oszpecona. W tych okolicznościach Saint-Laurent poznaje swojego nowego współpracownika, komendanta Matthieu Péraca (Guillaume Cramoisan)... Odile Vuillemin, choć wcześniej wystąpiła w kilku rodzimych produkcjach, prawdziwą popularność zdobyła dopiero dzięki świetnej roli Chloé w serialu "Profil"

programme.desc: Wyjątkowe zestawienie przebojów, które dzięki swojej energii nadadzą widzom odpowiedni rytm dnia. Ta muzyka jest rytmem ich pulsu

programme.title: Godzina z...
programme.desc: Nowatorski program skierowany do miłośników muzyki oraz DIY. Klipy przeplatają się tu z krótkimi filmikami zawierającymi porady dotyczące codziennych czynności - od majsterkowania, przez gotowanie po make up. Tematyka porad jest bardzo bogata i różnorodna. Dzięki nim, widzowie dowiedzą się m.in. tego, jak przygotować peeling z cukru lub kawy, jak przyrządzić domowe chipsy czy wykonać żyrandol ze szklanej butelki. Efekt końcowy zaskoczy każdego

programme.title: Godzina z...
programme.desc: Nowatorski program skierowany do miłośników muzyki oraz DIY. Klipy przeplatają się tu z krótkimi filmikami zawierającymi porady dotyczące codziennych czynności - od majsterkowania, przez gotowanie po make up. Tematyka porad jest bardzo bogata i różnorodna. Dzięki nim, widzowie dowiedzą się m.in. tego, jak przygotować peeling z cukru lub kawy, jak przyrządzić domowe chipsy czy wykonać żyrandol ze szklanej butelki. Efekt końcowy zaskoczy każdego

programme.title: Trinny i Susannah ubierają Danię
programme.desc: Brytyjskie ekspertki stylu Trinny Woodall i Susannah Constantine podróżują po całym świecie, pomagając zaniedbanym kobietom przeobrazić się w ikony stylu. Znawczynie kobiecej mody uczą panie, jak dobrze wyglądać. Ich misją jest wpojenie zasad dobrego stylu i rozsądnego podążania za modą. W tej serii Trinny i Susannah oceniają styl Dunek. W każdym odcinku spotykają się z kobietami o różnych modowych upodobaniach oraz gustach. Doradzają im oraz pomagają dobrać buty, dodatki, stroje odpowiednie dla ich sylwetki, typu urody i stylu życia. Specjalistki współpracują z doskonałymi fryzjerami, wizażystami i projektantami, by zmienić zwykłe kobiety w prawdziwe modelki

programme.title: Jej Szerokość Afrodyta
programme.desc: Kolejna odsłona serialu o perypetiach pięknej modelki Deb, która zginęła w wypadku samochodowym i powróciła na ziemię w ciele pulchnej prawniczki Jane Bingum (Brooke Elliott). Pod nową postacią dwie osobowości kobiety muszą nauczyć się koegzystować. Deb, dla której przed wypadkiem świat koncentrował się wokół nieskazitelnego wyglądu, przechodzi równie spektakularną wewnętrzną metamorfozę. Jane pomaga walczyć o sprawiedliwy wyrok matce, której syn zmarł nagle na obozie sportowym. Owen i Kim zaczynają przesadnie interesować się relacjami Jane i Iana

programme.title: Jasnowidząca Wanga
programme.desc: Mąż Wangi jest niezadowolony, że informacja o jej zdolnościach przepowiadania przyszłości szeroko się rozeszła. Kobieta mówi mu, że słyszy głosy umierających i osób, które chcą jej coś powiedzieć. Prosi go, aby pozwolił ludziom przychodzić do niej, bo pragnie im pomagać. Mąż boi się o życie swojej schorowanej matki. Wanga obiecuje, że dobrze się nią zajmie i kobieta przeżyje. Przerażona Wanga ostrzega natomiast męża, aby na wojnie, uważał na wodę... Zdradza też Alisi, kim była Olga i dlaczego zajmowała tak ważne miejsce w jej życiu

programme.title: Moje szalone włoskie wesele
programme.desc: Seria opowiada o pełnych przepychu, ekstrawaganckich weselach we Włoszech. W każdym odcinku kamera przygląda się przygotowaniom różnych par do ich wielkiego święta. Okazuje się, że niektórzy zakochani wydają majątek, by tego dnia zaimponować rodzinie lub spełnić swoje najbardziej osobliwe zachcianki. Niektóre pomysły wydają się bardzo zaskakujące

programme.title: Prognoza pogody
programme.desc: Program informacyjny

programme.title: Transporter
programme.desc: Trzeba odzyskać ważne dokumenty trzymane w pilnie strzeżonej willi na Krymie. Zleceniodawca chciał powierzyć to zadanie dwóm dostawcom: jednym z nich miał być Bernard Dassin, drugim - Frank. Ten ostatni, kierowany dumą i troską o własne bezpieczeństwo, nie przyjmuje oferty. Zmienia jednak zdanie, kiedy klient obwieszcza, że sprawa jest powiązana z zaginięciem ukochanej Franka. Istnieją dowody na to, że w jej zniknięcie był zamieszany minister, który obecnie przebywa właśnie na Półwyspie Krymskim. W tej sytuacji Frank jest zmuszony połączyć siły z Dassinem i jego pomocnikiem, Julesem Faroux. Dostawca nie wierzy w lojalność swoich nowych wspólników

programme.title: Panny młode z piekła rodem
programme.desc: Erice marzy się huczne wesele w Nowym Orleanie. Jednocześnie przyszła panna młoda nie radzi sobie z emocjami. Wciąż krzyczy na narzeczonego, płacze na przyjęciu przedweselnym i denerwuje się, gdy przychodzi pora na uiszczenie opłaty w kościele. W dniu ślubu jest jeszcze gorzej. Kobieta gubi buty, a tuż przed wejściem do świątyni, ściera się ze swoją matką, a to dopiero początek. W tym czasie Krystal skłóca się ze swoimi druhnami i musi znaleźć kogoś na zastępstwo. Wieczór panieński nie należy do udanych

programme.title: Nowa Ja!
programme.desc: Historie niezadowolonych z siebie i swojego życia kobiet, które pragną pozytywnej zmiany. Bohaterki programu opowiedzą o swoich problemach, trudnej przeszłości i źródłach obecnej, złej sytuacji. Następnie przejdą niezwykłą metamorfozę pod okiem trenerki rozwoju osobistego Joanny Godeckiej, stylistki i wizażystki Wiganny Papiny oraz fryzjera Andrzeja Frani. Dzięki nim staną się pewne swojej wartości, uporządkują panujący do tej pory w życiu chaos i poczują się piękniejsze. Odmienione stawią czoła codziennym przeciwnościom, z którymi do tej pory nie radziły sobie najlepiej. Ich szczerych i wzruszających zwierzeń wysłucha gospodyni programu Katarzyna Cichopek

programme.title: Jej Szerokość Afrodyta
programme.desc: Kolejna odsłona serialu o perypetiach pięknej modelki Deb, która zginęła w wypadku samochodowym i powróciła na ziemię w ciele pulchnej prawniczki Jane Bingum (Brooke Elliott). Pod nową postacią dwie osobowości kobiety muszą nauczyć się koegzystować. Deb, dla której przed wypadkiem świat koncentrował się wokół nieskazitelnego wyglądu, przechodzi równie spektakularną wewnętrzną metamorfozę. Ku zaskoczeniu Jane wychodzi na jaw, że Teri i Iana łączy wspólna przeszłość. Stacy coraz bardziej denerwuje się przed weselem. Boi się, że jej najlepsza przyjaciółka może nie dotrzeć na ceremonię(n)

programme.title: Z pamiętnika lekarki
programme.desc: Doktor Gretchen Haase ma złamane serce, kilka kilogramów nadwagi i nadzieję na szczęśliwą odmianę losu. Na razie porzucona przez niewiernego narzeczonego wraca do rodzinnego domu, gdzie musi wysłuchiwać narzekań matki, Barbary, która chętnie widziałaby ją na ślubnym ołtarzu. Lekarka ze zmiennym szczęściem walczy też ze swoją największą namiętnością - jedzeniem. Za radą ojca Gretchen poświęca się robieniu kariery. W pracy nieoczekiwanie wikła się w miłosny trójkąt z dwoma kolegami ze szpitalnego oddziału - dawnym znajomym ze szkoły, ordynatorem Markiem Meierem i wrażliwym ginekologiem doktorem Mehdim Kaanem. Odtąd operacje, diety i dwaj interesujący mężczyźni stanowią codzienność doktor Haase(n)

programme.title: Panny młode z piekła rodem
programme.desc: Krystal uznaje, że jest zbyt blada, by wystąpić na ślubie, który ma odbyć się na plaży. Stara się temu zaradzić. Zmusza też matkę i ojca, którzy od rozwodu nie rozmawiają ze sobą, do stawienia się na uroczystości, co ma fatalne skutki. Rodzinna awantura kończy się wyrzuceniem matki panny młodej z domu. W dniu ślubu świadek Krystal upija się tak, że ich kierowca nie chce zabrać ich do kościoła. W tym czasie Gabrielle dopracowuje szczegóły nadchodzącej ceremonii. Z czasem jednak traci kontrolę nad sytuacją i na koniec dnia załamana zalewa się łzami(n)

programme.title: Kochanie, zabijamy dzieciaki
programme.desc: Obserwujemy rodzinę z Birmingham, która jest zachęcana do zmiany swoich nawyków żywieniowych dla dobra dzieci. Tanya i Paul mieszkają w Essex, w południowej Anglii. Wychowują dwoje pociech, w których diecie jest za dużo cukru. Kris stwierdza, że dzieci prawie sześciokrotnie przekraczają normę jego spożycia. Muszą ograniczyć słodycze na rzecz zdrowych przekąsek. Swainowie muszą też nauczyć się spędzać razem czas wolny. Zamiast siedzieć przed telewizorem, ruszają na wyprawę kajakową. 11-letni Ryan i jego młodsza siostra zaczynają pomagać w domu, a ich rodzice zapisują się na lekcje salsy(n)
